Package controller

Class BoardControllerUtils

java.lang.Object
controller.BoardControllerUtils
public final class BoardControllerUtils extends Object
An utility class for the BoardController.

      A getter for the king of this turn.
      Parameters:
      match - the current match.
      mapGuiPieceToPiece - the current map of GuiPiece-Piece.
      Returns:
      the king of this turn.

    • getKingOfTheOtherTurn

      A getter for the king of the opposite turn.
      Parameters:
      match - the current match.
      mapGuiPieceToPiece - the current map of GuiPiece-Piece.
      Returns:
      the king of the other turn.

    • setEffect

      public static void setEffect(javafx.scene.paint.Color color, javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle rectangle)
      A setter for the effects of the rectangles. Also used when the king is on check to show it.
      Parameters:
      color - the color of the effects.
      rectangle - the affected rectangle.

    • removeEffect

      public static void removeEffect(javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle rectangle, Game match, Map<GuiPiece,Piece> mapGuiPieceToPiece)
      If the rectangle is not the king's rectangle, or if the king is not in check, then remove the effect from the rectangle.
      Parameters:
      rectangle - the rectangle of the piece that is being checked
      match - the game object
      mapGuiPieceToPiece - a map that maps a GuiPiece to a Piece.

    • setEffectPlayerTurn

      public static void setEffectPlayerTurn(javafx.scene.text.Text text, javafx.scene.image.ImageView image)
      A method for setting effects to the image and name of the player who is moving the pieces. It colors the name red and lower the brightness of the other player's image.
      Parameters:
      text - the name of the player who is moving the pieces.
      image - the image of the other player.

    • removeEffects

      public static void removeEffects(javafx.scene.text.Text text, javafx.scene.image.ImageView image)
      Removes the effects from the image and sets the text options.
      Parameters:
      text - The Text object that you want to apply the effect to.
      image - The ImageView that you want to apply the effect to.

    • setTextOptions

      public static void setTextOptions(javafx.scene.text.Text text)
      Sets the style and color of the text.
      Parameters:
      text - The text object that you want to set the options for.

    • getBackground

      public static javafx.scene.layout.Background getBackground(javafx.scene.paint.Color theme)
      This method returns a Background object with a BackgroundFill object that has a theme color, null insets, and null radius.
      Parameters:
      theme - The color of the background
      Returns:
      A Background object with a BackgroundFill object as its parameter.
